amendment.description: To provide for the review of certifications by the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3919, pursuant to the order of January 31, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was withdrawn in Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3919, pursuant to the order of January 31, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 57. Record Vote Number: 18.

action.text: Amendment SA 3919 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S707; text: CR S707) To provide for the review of certifications by the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3919, pursuant to the order of January 31, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 57. Record Vote Number: 18.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3919, pursuant to the order of January 31, 2008, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 57. Record Vote Number: 18.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3919 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3911.
